text: Manuel Almeida Duarte (29 May 1945 – 2 September 2022) was a Portuguese footballer. He played as a striker. He played for the Portugal national football team, making two appearances in 1966. Duarte died on 2 September 2022 at the age of 77.Manuel Duarte, um dos "magriços", morre aos 77 anos ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Portuguese footballers
title: Manuel Duarte
